Résumé

Experience

  • Apr. 2019-Now: Freelancer

    • I can do small or medium-size projects which may be finished in 1 or 2 months, related to AI, of course. I prefer NLP projects. But you should contact me to tell what you want, we can discuss deeply to find solutions. I can introduce someone to help you if need.
    • Check my Portfolio

  • Jan. 2020-Now: TopCV Joint-stock Company

    AI Engineer

    • TopCV is the first platform connecting between recuiters and candidates via CV in Vietnam.
    • Building smart systems and modules integrated with existed systems

  • Jun. 2019-Aug. 2019: NExT++ research center

    Intern Researcher

    • NExT++ is a joint research center established by the National University of Singapore, Tsinghua University of China and University of Southampton, UK.
    • Building a chatbot for DietLens
    • Building data analysis service for DietLens

  • Sep. 2017-Aug. 2018: Finsify Co.,Ltd

    Data Scientist/Leader of AI Team

    • Finsify is a fintech company in Vietnam. People often know my company through our famous product, Moneylover.
    • Developing data analysis services: bank transactions classification, bank transaction amount prediction, transaction suggestion

  • Aug. 2016 - Apr. 2017: VNG Corporation

    Research Scientist

    • VNG is one of the biggest internet services company in Vietnam. We are famous with many productions: Zing Me, Zalo, Vo Lam Truyen Ky game, ... According to World Start-up Report, VNG is an only unicorn start-up in Vietnam.
    • Building a fraud detection system for Zalo Pay
    • Building Natural Language Understanding module in dialogue system for 123Xe service

  • Dec. 2015 - Aug. 2016: Rich Anchor Technology

    Machine Learning Engineer

    • Rich Anchor is a start-up company. We have a dream to build a recommendation system for content providers.
    • Developing recommendation system for Alezaa eBook store
    • Developing data analysis services for Money Lover app (outsourcing)
